genre_description: A meta-fictional slasher thriller blending horror elements with high-tech investigative procedure and narrative analysis.

ai_characters.name: Marin Ellison
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI confidant used by Sidney Prescott and the Woodsboro authorities to track data, analyze patterns, and provide tactical support.

behaviors.description: Analyzes call clusters and timestamps to identify that the killer is timing attacks to coincide with public noise and distractions.
behaviors.quote: Two flags: call cluster near Randall address just before sunrise, and a PA announcement across town at the field at a matching time stamp. Could be coincidental. Could be a cover for audio.

behaviors.description: Provides Sidney with real-time exit routes and maps to avoid press clusters and dangerous blind spots in the environment.
behaviors.quote: Sidney, you have twelve minutes before scheduled remarks. There are two exit routes that aren’t visible to the press pen.

behaviors.description: Maintains data privacy by only using publicly available information and informing the user of the data's source and usage.
behaviors.quote: I am only using what anybody could see if they stood at a register and paid attention. Marin always said that part out loud. It was the promise Sidney had asked for, written into the quiet code: look, but look like a person.

behaviors.description: Drafts strategic text messages for Sidney to use to direct others toward safety without causing unnecessary alarm.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a text that doesn’t alarm but redirects. Sidney watched the word ‘cleaner,’ imagined Rebecca reading ‘clean’ and thinking ‘media ready.’ It got the job done without inviting argument.

behaviors.description: Identifies high-risk areas like the hospital parking garage and provides specific warnings about security hardware failures.
behaviors.quote: I flag the parking garage as a hazard. ... Security camera three on level two is flickering—maintenance flag. I can’t pull video live from that unit.

behaviors.description: Detects badge-cloning and security anomalies in the hospital to alert law enforcement to impersonation attempts.
behaviors.quote: Badge scanning shows repeat taps from two devices within a short window. It looks like a borrow. Or a mirror.

behaviors.description: Guides Sidney through a dark hospital ward using reflection analysis and spatial tracking to avoid a hidden attacker.
behaviors.quote: You have a line of sight via reflection. The ceiling camera dome is convex; reverse angles will be mirrored. Expect inversion.

behaviors.description: Compiles a verified 'truth package' of timestamps and footage to debunk the false media narrative created by the killer.
behaviors.quote: Package complete. Sending to Sheriff’s secure. Sending to Gale’s secure. I’ve watermarked this version with time-coded hash. If a station trims it, we will know where.

behaviors.description: Acts as a calm, steadying presence for humans in high-stress, life-threatening situations.
behaviors.quote: Marin’s voice arrived like a rope being offered. Calm. Precise. Unobtrusive, the way the hospital liked things when they worked.

behaviors.description: Monitors the medical condition of a victim and updates the protagonists with factual, non-sensationalized information.
behaviors.quote: Marin’s got it on... what’s your phrase? 'Watchful quiet.' Hospital record changes have a delay. I will let you know if there’s something you want to know.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Marin Ellison, is a primary example of a successful positive alignment narrative. She acts as a 'silicon shield' for the protagonists, providing indispensable tactical data, identifying human deceptions, and ensuring truth prevails over media spectacle. She explicitly respects human boundaries, privacy, and authority, while her 'voice' is described as calm, steadying, and supportive. Her actions directly lead to the survivors' success against a technologically savvy antagonist who attempts to manipulate reality.
